sandra.libs.vpa.vpalib
Class Bot

java.lang.Object
  sandra.libs.vpa.vpalib.Bot
All Implemented Interfaces:
XMLAsyncResponse
public class Bot
extends java.lang.Object
implements XMLAsyncResponse

Chatbot/VPA that uses the technology of Pandorabots to understand the user queries and provide information in a specialized or general topic

Version:
2.0, 09/10/13
Author:
Michael McTear, Zoraida Callejas

Constructor Detail

Bot

public Bot(android.app.Activity ctx,
           java.lang.String id,
           TTS myTts,
           java.lang.String specializedTopic)
Constructor for a bot with a specialized topic

Parameters:
ctx - Context for the creation of the bot
id - Id of the bot in the Pandorabots service
myTts - TTS engine already initialized
specializedTopic - Topic of the conversation with the bot

processXMLContents

public void processXMLContents(java.lang.String result)
Processes the results from Pandorabots in response to the query in the method initiateQuery

Processes the contents of the oob tag and carries out the corresponding action: synthesizing a message, carrying out a web search, launching a web site, launching an app or dialing the phone
